name: Hot Hot Sauce
description:
Made with Hawaiian chile peppers and Maui onions. This sauce is both delicious and fiery. This will quickly become your favorite condiment for eggs, soups even pizza!

5oz Jar
Ingredients: White Vinegar, Water, Maui Onion, Hawaiian Chile Pepper, Garlic, Sea Salt & Black Pepper.

name: Thai Chile Hot Sauce
description:
Locally grown Thai chiles and Maui grown and roasted coffee make this sauce the best of both extremes. 

A great flavor enhancer for use in cooking or as a condiment. 

5oz 
Ingredients: white vinegar, water, Maui onion, Maui coffee, Maui Thai chiles, garlic, sea salt.

name: Smokey Habanero Hot Sauce
description:
Our hottest hot sauce yet!
Maui Gold Pineapple adds great body for the Maui Habanero Pepper.  This sauce has a great smokey flavor and intensely delicious habanero heat on the front of the bite.
Limited availability.

*Please note: product color may vary from batch to batch. All of our products are made with all natural ingredients and are free from artifical colors and preservatives. Habanero peppers used for this sauce vary in color from yellow to red. Mahalo for your understanding.

Net Wt. 5 fl oz (147 g)
Ingredients: Maui Onion, White Vinegar, Water, Maui Gold Pineapple, Garlic, Cider Vinegar, Habanero Peppers. Lapsang Souchong Tea, Sea Salt, Black Pepper.

name: Mai Tai Kit
description:
This gift set includes Maui Preserved Sweet & Spicy Pineapple, Pineapple Cane Syrup and Vanilla Powder.  These ingredients start you on an easy path to the perfect Mai Tai at home.  But don't stop there because these flavors will make any cocktail pop! Comes gift wrapped in a lauhala basket.

Maui Preserved Mai Tai Recipe:
3 fl oz dark rum
3 fl oz light rum
4 fl oz MP Pineapple Cane Syrup
4 fl oz orange juice
1 teaspoon of MP Vanilla Powder or to taste
2 Spears of MP Sweet and Spicy Pineapple
2 cups ice cubes

Directions:
In a cocktail mixer full of ice, combine the light rum, pineapple cane syrup, orange juice and vanilla powder. Shake vigorously and strain into glass full of ice. Top with a float of dark rum and garnish with pineapple spear.
Serves 2.

Enjoy with Aloha!

name: Sweet & Spicy Maui Pineapple
description:
Fresh cut Maui Gold Pineapple preserved in a light Maui cane sugar syrup with spicy Hawaiian Chiles.
Great as a snack or make your drinks special with a slice of the best pineapple in the world. 
Those other cans just canâ€™t compare.
Makes a great gift!

16oz Jar
Ingredients: Organic Maui Pineapple, Water, Maui Brand Natural Sugar, Organic Hawaiian Chile Peppers.
This product contains 100% Maui Grown Ingredients

name: Maui Vanilla Powder
description:
A culinary powerhouse, this pure vanilla powder lends itself to both sweet AND savory applications, for chefs and home cooks alike.  The entire bean is dehydrated to produce a potent product that requires three-quarters less in your recipes (compared to traditional extract.)  Dust some on your favorite fruit, add it to your next smoothie, or try it in your favorite baked good recipe.    

1oz. Jar
Ingredients:  100% Pure Maui Vanilla Beans

name: Maui Vanilla Beans
description:
We proudly offer this 5-pack of Maui Vanilla Beans, grown and cured on the Valley Isle.   The process of growing vanilla beans is one of patience and precision, with no room for error.   Our beans boast high moisture content and are some of the only beans grown in the United States.      Fresh and bursting with flavor.

5oz Jar
Contains 5 Maui Vanilla Beans

name: Roasted Tomato Puree
description:
Now made with 100% Maui tomatoes. Enjoy homemade, from scratch flavor but we do the work for you! Simply seasoned with basil, garlic, sea salt & pepper.

16oz Jar
Ingredients:
Roasted Maui Tomatoes, Garlic, Olive Oil, Basil, Sea Salt, Black Pepper.

name: Pickled Pohole Fern
description:
The fern shoots in the Athyrium species are called Pohole on Maui, ho'i'o on the Big Island of Hawaii, pako in the Philippines and warabi in Japan. Growing wild in the rainforest of East Maui, this member of the fiddlehead fern family has slightly curly tops that are crunchy in texture and mild in flavor.

Voted "Best of Hawaii- Best take home omiyage (souvenir)" 2012

16 oz Jar
Ingredients: Maui Fern Shoots (Pohole), Natural Apple Cider Vinegar, Water, Pickling Spices, Lavender, Sea Salt.

name: Pineapple Cane Syrup
description:
Maui Gold Pineapple infused with fresh Turbinado cane crystals from Maui's sugar plantation. Captures the true essence of Maui.
5 oz Jar
Ingredients: Water, Cane Sugar,
Maui Gold Pineapple.

name: Maui Onion Pepper Jam
description:
Organic purple Peruvian peppers marry with the bright Maui Onion to produce one of our most versatile products.  Great with cream cheese, as a hot dog relish, meat marinade or stir fry sauce. Handmade in small batches with fresh, high quality Maui grown ingredients.

8 oz jar
Ingredients: Maui Onions, Organic Peruvian peppers, Maui Brand Natural Sugar, Natural Apple Cider Vinegar, Sea Salt, Meyer lemon zest, Natural pectin, Olive oil

name: Dill Pickled Beets
description:
Small, tender, fresh Maui grown beets. Kula grown organic dill. A touch of Maui honey.

16oz Jar
Ingredients:
Maui Beets, White Vinegar, Cider Vinegar, Water, Maui Honey, Sea Salt, Dill Weed, Black Peppercorn, Pickling Spices, Green Tea.

name: Vanilla Gift Set
description: This gift set includes two jars of Maui Preserved Maui grown vanilla beans (that's ten beans!) and two one ounce jars of whole vanilla bean powder.  This gift is perfect for the baker in your life, an avid gourmand or any home cook.  Vanilla adds a wonderful richness to your dishes.  Our Vanilla set makes replacing your extract with 100% Maui grown real Vanilla affordable and fun!

name: Pickled Maui Onions
description:
Kula Sweet Onions add just the right sweet to this spicy pickle recipe. Add to your sandwich or use as side dish.

16oz Jar
Ingredients:
Maui Onions, Vinegar, Water, Sea Salt, Chile Peppers, Spices.
